short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuikBox Desktop Streamer is a desktop sharing plugin for use with QuikBox Connect (The QuikBox video conferencing solution).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuikBox Desktop Streamer is a desktop sharing plugin for use with QuikBox Connect (The QuikBox video conferencing solution).
